description: At least ElasticFox and the EC2 API tools fail to parse our responses, because the API version they request (part of the HTTP query) is not used to construct the xmlns of the response they get back. It's likely that other clients have similar problems.
title: xml namespace should match API version

comments.content: At least ElasticFox and the EC2 API tools fail to parse our responses, because the API version they request (part of the HTTP query) is not used to construct the xmlns of the response they get back. It's likely that other clients have similar problems.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~soren
